required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pilot-Tart Cherry, Mitral Transcriptome, and POAF Incidence
clinical_study.official_title: Pilot-Tart Cherry, Mitral Transcriptome and POAF Incidence

brief_summary.textblock: Assess impact of Tart Cherry Concentrate in cardiac surgical patients on POAF and related clinical and economic outcomes. Measure inflammation gene transcripts in cardiac tissue.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Single arm, open-label design. Commercial Montmorency tart cherry juice concentrate. Consumption - 2 servings (1 ounce or 2 tablespoon/serving) per day for three days before cardiac surgery

primary_outcome.description: Patients will complete a brief questionnaire regarding gastrointestinal status, using the Bristol Stool Form Scale

primary_outcome.measure: Efficacy as measured by total number of days in hospital within 60 days of surgery
primary_outcome.description: Total number of days in hospital within 60 days of the index surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to conversion to normal sinus rhythm
secondary_outcome.description: Perioperative time to conversion to normal sinus rhythm

secondary_outcome.measure: Need for permanent pacemaker within 30 days of surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Need for permanent pacemaker within 30 days of surgery
Incidences (yes/no, total number) of Cerebrovascular thromboembolism [stroke, TIA]
Incidences (yes/no, total number) of Non-cerebrovascular thromboembolism
Incidences (yes/no, total number) of Cerebrovascular events
Incidences (yes/no, total number) of Non-cerebrovascular events

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Re-hospitalization and ED visits
secondary_outcome.description: Number of Re-hospitalization and ED visits

arm_group.description: Single arm, open-label design. Commercial Montmorency tart cherry juice concentrate. Servings (1 ounce or 2 tablespoon/serving) per day for three days

intervention.description: Consume 2 servings (1 ounce or 2 tablespoon/serving) per day for three days before cardiac surgery

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Males and female patients (age 50-79) at the Mitral Valve Clinic/CVC undergoing elective cardiac surgery for mitral valve repair without the Cox MAZE procedure (MVR patients also undergoing CABG and/or tricuspid valve repair are also eligible)
2. In sinus rhythm (no pre-operative atrial fibrillation, no hx of AF)
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Age â‰¥ 80 years
2. Diagnosed pre-operative chronic or paroxysmal AF
3. Prior ablation procedure for AF
4. Previous cardiac surgery
5. Implanted pacemaker
6. Active smoker
7. Comorbidities such as congenital or cardiac re-operation
8. Use of antiarrhythmic agents
9. Active inflammatory or infectious disease or malignancy
10. Diagnosed autoimmune disease
11. Corticosteroid or other immunomodulatory or immunosuppressive medication
12. Known sensitivity to sorbitol
13. Known gastric sensitivity to acidic juices like orange juice
